title: Lord of the Rings - Battle for middle earth - Latest patches + m
description:
** for Single player **

1. run "BFME 2 v1_06 Patch.exe" to patch BFME 2 original
2. run "BFME 2 WK v2_01 Patch.exe" to patch BFME 2 Witch King
3. copy "game.dat" from folder "BFME 2 v1_06 Crack" to your BFME 2 original install folder
4. copy "game.dat" from folder "BFME 2 WK v2_01 Crack" to your BFME 2 witch king install folder


** If you want to LAN this game **

1. run "BFME 2 v1_06 Patch.exe" to patch BFME 2 original
2. run "BFME 2 WK v2_01 Patch.exe" to patch BFME 2 Witch King
3. Unrar "BFME 2 Mini Image.rar" and mount "BFME 2 Mini Image.mds" to play BFME 2 original
4. Unrar "BFME 2 WK Mini Image.rar" and mount "BFME 2 WK Mini Image.mds" to play BFME 2 witch king

Note: With a cracked game.dat the version number will change every time you launch the game. 
To play over LAN you need the same version and by mounting a mini image with original game.dat is the only way to play.
If you have already replaced game.dat you just run the patches again and it will restore game.dat to its original version.
